channel.title: Join Forces - Viiitality {Chill, Electronic}
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/viiitalitymusic/join-forces
after 2 months of on/off work on this track, I'm happy to present this track to you! as the description says, "at first, I was inspired by DeCruz's song Blue Bird and made the chords/snaps in the intro, but then it kinda spiraled into another track that I especially love. hope you guys enjoy!"
**samples:** https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1WhPfrp5x6mD-tgK_GByzGj4o60obeaA3

item.title: Join Forces - Viiitality {Chill, Electronic}
item.dc:creator: viiitality
item.description:
you can absolutely remix this! I’ll DM u.

item.title: Join Forces - Viiitality {Chill, Electronic}
item.dc:creator: BobTheGUYYYYY
item.description:
After listening to this enough times, I kind of want to remix it. Could you DM me the project link? Feel free to say nah.

Read full topic

item.title: Join Forces - Viiitality {Chill, Electronic}
item.dc:creator: viiitality
item.description:
haha, thanks! I actually kinda based the title of this song from the audio sample of Eisenhower and the atomic bomb. I originally envisioned a sample of an inspirational speech or something, and originally the theme was around peace (hence “Join Forces”), but I struggled to find a speech that I liked, so I used the atomic bomb sample. hope this kinda explained something!

Read full topic

item.title: Join Forces - Viiitality {Chill, Electronic}
item.dc:creator: BobTheGUYYYYY
item.description:
This is actually quite nice! I like it, but for a track called “Join Forces” I feel like it could’ve moved a little more or had a little more intensity, but that’s just my two cents. Keep it up!

Read full topic

item.description:
I can definitely hear the inspiration but I like what it became good stuff bro
